an4.21:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an4.21:2.1: “Ekamidaham, bhikkhave, samayam uruvelayam viharami najja neranjaraya tire ajapalanigrodhe pathamabhisambuddho.
an4.21:2.2: Tassa mayham, bhikkhave, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
an4.21:2.4: Kim nu kho aham samanam va brahmanam va sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyan’ti?
an4.21:3.2: ‘aparipurassa kho aham silakkhandhassa paripuriya annam samanam va brahmanam va sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyam.
an4.21:3.3: Na kho panaham passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya annam samanam va brahmanam va attana silasampannataram, yamaham sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyam.
an4.21:4.1: Aparipurassa kho aham samadhikkhandhassa paripuriya annam samanam va brahmanam va sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyam.
an4.21:4.2: Na kho panaham passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya annam samanam va brahmanam va attana samadhisampannataram, yamaham sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyam.
an4.21:5.1: Aparipurassa kho aham pannakkhandhassa paripuriya annam samanam va brahmanam va sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyam.
an4.21:5.2: Na kho panaham passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya annam samanam va brahmanam va attana pannasampannataram, yamaham sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyam.
an4.21:6.1: Aparipurassa kho aham vimuttikkhandhassa paripuriya annam samanam va brahmanam va sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyam.
an4.21:6.2: Na kho panaham passami sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya annam samanam va brahmanam va attana vimuttisampannataram, yamaham sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyan’ti.
an4.21:7.2: ‘yannunaham yvayam dhammo maya abhisambuddho tameva dhammam sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihareyyan’ti.
an4.21:8.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, brahma sahampati mama cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—brahmaloke antarahito mama purato paturahosi.
an4.21:8.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, brahma sahampati ekamsam uttarasangam karitva dakkhinam janumandalam pathaviyam nihantva yenaham tenanjalim panametva mam etadavoca:
an4.21:8.4: Yepi te, bhante, ahesum atitamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha tepi bhagavanto dhammamyeva sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharimsu;
an4.21:8.5: yepi te, bhante, bhavissanti anagatamaddhanam arahanto sammasambuddha tepi bhagavanto dhammamyeva sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharissanti;
an4.21:8.6: bhagavapi, bhante, etarahi araham sammasambuddho dhammamyeva sakkatva garum katva upanissaya viharatu’ti.
an4.21:12.2: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
an4.21:12.3: Atha khvaham, bhikkhave, brahmuno ca ajjhesanam viditva attano ca patirupam yvayam dhammo maya abhisambuddho tameva dhammam sakkatva garum katva upanissaya vihasim.
an4.21:12.4: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, sanghopi mahattena samannagato, atha me sanghepi garavo”ti.
